professionals.page_description: As a professional, coach or advisor, you can purchase access codes for your clients. Please fill out the form below.

what_you_get.title: What do you get?
what_you_get.feature1: Access codes that you can share directly with your clients
what_you_get.feature2: Full access to the entire Vinster process per code

how_it_works.title: How does it work?
how_it_works.step1: Fill out the form with your email and desired quantity
how_it_works.step3: Receive the access codes immediately after payment
how_it_works.step4: Share the codes with your clients

organization_form.title: For organizations
organization_form.introduction: Are you a career coach or mobility advisor at a larger organization?
organization_form.description: Fill out the form below. We will send an invoice to your organization. Once the invoice is paid, you will receive the access codes directly in your email.
organization_form.organization_placeholder: For example: UMCG, Hanzeplein 1, 9700 RB Groningen
organization_form.success_message: Thank you for your request! You will receive an email from team@vinster.ai with more information soon.
